name: Ext_R3_Condition_verificationStatus
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.Condition.verificationStatus for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Condition.verificationStatus from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Condition|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: provisional | differential | confirmed | refuted | entered-in-error | unknown
element.definition: The verification status to support the clinical status of the condition.
element.comment: `Condition.verificationStatus` maps to R5 `Condition.verificationStatus`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
element.isModifierReason: This extension is a modifier because the target element Condition.verificationStatus is flagged IsModifier
